base_description: White spherical object on a wire stand.
part_description: Sphere is smooth and white, attached to a looped wire stand. The stand is circular at the base, supporting the sphere above it.
internal_interaction_description: The sphere is balanced on the wire stand, with the wire looping around to form a stable base. The connection between the sphere and the wire is at the top, ensuring the sphere remains upright.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces, serving as a decorative piece. It interacts with light, casting subtle shadows through the wire stand. It can be moved easily due to its lightweight structure.
